info.name: Portal Migration
info.description:
Requests under this folder are for creating and enabling an REST API in target Portal tenant.

Get access token for the target tenant before running requests under this folder.

item.name: Get All destination RateQuotas of type Organization

item.name: Get All Api UUIDs From Source

exec: // Get all API uuids from source and save to apisApiUuids
// Get each of the API detail info from source one by and one based on the apisApiUuids and POST it to destination
// if the api is GW published one and not yet accedpted, we need to assign a default api eula to it
// otherwise we're not able to migrate it due to the validation error
throw new Error("apisApiUuids value is null");
